verses.verse: <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, how are they <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H6862>trouble<s%> <S%H7227>me<s%>! many are they that rise up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> there be which <S%H559>say<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, There is no <S%H3444>help<s%> for him in <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
But <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, are a <S%H4043>shield<s%> for <S%H3519>me<s%>; my glory, and the lifter <S%H7311>up<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>.
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
I laid me <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept<s%>; I <S%H6974>awaked<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> sustained <S%H5564>me<s%>.
I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%>, that have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves against me round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God: for you have <S%H5221>struck<s%> all my <S%H341>enemies<s%> upon the cheek <S%H3895>bone<s%>; you have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>ungodly<s%>.
<S%H3444>Salvation<s%> belongs unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: your <S%H1293>blessing<s%> is upon your <S%H5971>people<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
